hints.content:
$73{,}\green{2}50$ is composed of:  
$7 \text{ ten thousands} + 3 \text{ thousands} + \green{2\text{ hundreds}} + 5\text{ tens}$.  

 We can use place value to express this in a different way.

$\green{2\text{ hundreds}}$ can be written as $\blue{1\text{ hundred} + 1\text{ hundred}}$.

So, $\green{2\text{ hundreds}} + 5\text{ tens}$ can be regrouped this way:  

$\begin{align}\green{2\text{ hundreds}} + 5 \text{ tens}&=\blue{1\text{ hundred} + 1\text{ hundred}} + 5 \text{ tens}\\
&= 1 \text{ hundred} + 10 \text{ tens} + 5 \text{ tens}\\
&= 1 \text{ hundred} + \purple{15} \text{ tens}.\end{align}$

The other digits will not change.

|  | | | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-| :- | :-
$73{,}250$ | $=$ | $7\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$| $3\text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $2\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $5\text{ tens}$
$73{,}250$ | $=$ | $7\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$ | $3\text{ thousands}$ | $+$|  $1\text{ hundred}$ | $+$|$\maroonD{15\text{ tens}}$

question.content:
**Regroup to express the number in a different way.**

 |  | | | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-| :- | :-
$73{,}250$ | $=$ | $7\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$| $3\text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $2\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $5\text{ tens}$
$73{,}250$ | $=$ | $7\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$ | $3\text{ thousands}$ | $+$|  $1\text{ hundred}$ | $+$| [[â˜ƒ dropdown 1]]
